Package me.lokka30.microlib.items

Class ItemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lokka30.microlib.items.ItemBuilder
  • public class ItemBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows you to create an ItemStack object, with as little as 1 line of code.
    Since:
    unknown
